summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SafarAI platform - backend APIs working correctly, frontend UI fully functional, identified and fixed Firecrawl integration issue

critical_bugs.issue: Firecrawl API method changed from scrape_url to scrape, and returns Document object instead of dict
critical_bugs.impact: Pipeline execution fails when crawling external sources

design_issues.issue: Missing Description warning in console for DialogContent

passed_tests: All 11 backend API endpoints working correctly
Dashboard page loads with stats and RUN NOW button
Sources page displays 6 default sources correctly
Run Metrics page displays run details
Logs page shows run logs with filtering
action_item_for_main_agent: Firecrawl integration has been fixed. The pipeline should now work correctly for crawling external sources. Consider adding aria-describedby to DialogContent components to resolve console warnings.
